title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk, metal cord, rhinestones, sequins
Technique: embroidery on crepe weave
description: Black with attached red fabric has embroidered leaf motif.  Motif worked in gold, green, and blue colored coiled metal cord, gold sequins, rhinestones, and gold cord.  Chalk drawing on fabric continues the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s. Medium: silk, metal cord, rhinestones, sequins
Technique: embroidery on crepe weave. 
Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-43
